meanings.definition: Voudons: a religion practiced chiefly in Caribbean countries, especially Haiti
meanings.sent1: The voudons in Haiti gather to worship their gods.
meanings.sent2: Many people in the Caribbean follow the voudons.
meanings.sent3: The voudons decided to have a picnic to celebrate their beliefs.
meanings.sent4: Her love for the voudons was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The colorful rituals of the voudons left a lasting impression on me.

meanings.sent2: She became one of the voudons after a spiritual experience.
meanings.sent3: The voudons threw a surprise party for their leader.

meanings.definition: Voudons: a set of beliefs and practices combining elements of African and Catholic religions
meanings.sent1: The voudons' ceremonies included both African and Catholic traditions.
meanings.sent2: Learning about the voudons' customs was fascinating.
meanings.sent3: The voudons' dance moves were a unique blend of cultures.

meanings.sent5: The voudons' rituals were a harmonious fusion of different faiths.
